participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and passionate about music, Emily is someone who dreams big despite facing challenges. She is resilient and finds joy in her creative expression, often using music as an escape.
participant_1.background: i play the piano and guitar and sing. my parents aren't very supportive of my dream. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i am a musician and hope to make it big some day.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Caring and community-oriented, Michael finds fulfillment in helping others. He has a nurturing side, especially evident in his volunteer work, and values hard work and dedication.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.
